Steve Howell (showell) said:

My personal pet peeve with Zulip is that we donâ€™t have a dialog box when you create a topic. Maybe we save the user from an extra mouse click or tap on the enter key. But we have a confusing experience where we literally sacrifice having a dialog with the user.

When would the box show up and what would it say?

After you clicked on New Topic the box would have a dropdown for streams, a textbox for topics, some minor things like help links, some links to colliding topics as you typed, and two or three buttons to let you choose whether you narrow to the new topic, or stay in the old narrow, or possibly go to an interleaved view.
It occurs to me that for minor topic digressions you may want an interleaved view that only encompasses the old and new topic, but nothing else in the stream(s).
